amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that increasing personal savings is a necessary step toward ensuring the economic security of all the people of the United States upon retirement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 106 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 21.

action.text: Amendment SA 106 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S818-820; text: CR S819) To express the sense of the Senate that increasing personal savings is a necessary step toward ensuring the economic security of all the people of the United States upon retirement.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 106 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 21.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 106 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 21.
